001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages;
002
003import org.slf4j.Logger;
004import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.PumpStateSupplier;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.models.Packet;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
011import org.apache.commons.codec.digest.HmacAlgorithms;
012import org.apache.commons.codec.digest.HmacUtils;
013import org.apache.commons.lang3.ArrayUtils;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.Arrays;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.stream.Collectors;
018
019public class Packetize {
020    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Packetize.class);
021    public static TransactionId txId = new TransactionId();
022
023    // TODO: these comments about chunk size are almost certainly due to the MTU.
024    public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE = 18; // This was observed for currentStatus. It may be 40 for control.
025    public static final int CONTROL_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE = 40; // this is a guess, it works for control.BolusPermissionResponse. maybe it should actually be 20?
026
027    private static int determineMaxChunkSize(Message message) {
028        if (message.getCharacteristic().equals(Characteristic.CONTROL) && message.type().equals(MessageType.REQUEST)) {
029            log.debug("using maxChunkSize="+CONTROL_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE+" for control request characteristic");
030            return CONTROL_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE;
031        }
032
033        return DEFAULT_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE;
034    }
035
036    public static List<Packet> packetize(Message message, byte[] authenticationKey, byte currentTxId) {
037        return packetize(message, authenticationKey, currentTxId, determineMaxChunkSize(message));
038    }
039
040    public static List<Packet> packetize(Message message, byte[] authenticationKey, byte currentTxId, int maxChunkSize) {
041        if (message == null) {
042            log.error("packetize has null message");
043        } else if (message.getCargo() == null) {
044            log.error("packetize has null messagecargo messageName="+message.messageName());
045            log.error("packetize has null messagecargo message="+message+" authKey="+Hex.encodeHexString(authenticationKey));
046        }
047        int length = 3 + message.getCargo().length;
048        if (message.signed()) {
049            length += 24;
050        }
051        byte[] packet = new byte[length];
052        packet[0] = (byte) message.opCode();
053        packet[1] = currentTxId;
054        packet[2] = (byte) (length - 3);
055        // packet[3 ... N] filled with message cargo
056        System.arraycopy(message.getCargo(), 0, packet, 3, message.getCargo().length);
057
058        //log.debug("packetize signed "+message.signed()+": packetBefore="+ Hex.encodeHexString(packet));
059        if (message.props().modifiesInsulinDelivery() && !PumpStateSupplier.actionsAffectingInsulinDeliveryEnabled.get()) {
060            throw new ActionsAffectingInsulinDeliveryNotEnabledInPumpX2Exception();
061        }
062        if (message.signed()) {
063            int i = length - 20;
064            byte[] messageData = new byte[i];
065            System.arraycopy(packet, 0, messageData, 0, i);
066            long pumpStateTimeSinceReset = PumpStateSupplier.pumpTimeSinceReset.get();
067            byte[] timeSinceReset = Bytes.toUint32(pumpStateTimeSinceReset);
068            System.arraycopy(timeSinceReset, 0, messageData, length - 24, 4);
069
070            log.debug("using authenticationKey=" + Hex.encodeHexString(authenticationKey) + " pumpTimeSinceReset=" + pumpStateTimeSinceReset);
071
072            byte[] hmacSha1Output = doHmacSha1(messageData, authenticationKey);
073            System.arraycopy(messageData, 0, packet, 0, i);
074            System.arraycopy(hmacSha1Output, 0, packet, i, hmacSha1Output.length);
075        }
076        //log.debug("packetize packetAfter="+ Hex.encodeHexString(packet));
077
078        // Append CRC to packet
079        byte[] crc = Bytes.calculateCRC16(packet);
080        byte[] packetWithCRC = ArrayUtils.addAll(packet, crc);
081        //log.debug("packetize packetWithCRC="+ Hex.encodeHexString(packetWithCRC));
082
083        // Fill Packet list with chunks of size 18 (maxChunkSize)
084        List<Packet> packets = new ArrayList<>();
085        List<List<Byte>> chunked = partitionList(packetWithCRC, maxChunkSize);
086
087        int b = chunked.size() - 1;
088        for (List<Byte> bytes : chunked) {
089            byte[] elem = ArrayUtils.toPrimitive(bytes.toArray(new Byte[0]));
090            packets.add(new Packet((byte) b, currentTxId, elem));
091            b--;
092        }
093
094        return packets;
095    }
096
097    public static List<List<Byte>> partitionList(byte[] packetWithCRC, int partitionSize) {
098        List<List<Byte>> partitions = new ArrayList<>();
099        List<Byte> subList = new ArrayList<>();
100
101        for (byte b : packetWithCRC) {
102            subList.add(b);
103            if (subList.size() == partitionSize) {
104                partitions.add(subList);
105                subList = new ArrayList<>();
106            }
107        }
108
109        if (!subList.isEmpty()) {
110            partitions.add(subList);
111        }
112
113        return partitions;
114    }
115
116    public static byte[] doHmacSha1(byte[] data, byte[] key) {
117        return new HmacUtils(HmacAlgorithms.HMAC_SHA_1, key).hmac(data);
118    }
119
120    public static class ActionsAffectingInsulinDeliveryNotEnabledInPumpX2Exception extends RuntimeException {
121        ActionsAffectingInsulinDeliveryNotEnabledInPumpX2Exception() {
122            super("The developer of this application has not enabled actions which affect insulin delivery");
123        }
124    }
125}
